title: [K-12] Elementary Arithmetic Skill Enhancement Course Utilizing Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational arithmetic operation comprehension (e.g., basic concepts of addition/subtraction/multiplication/division)
context.additional_context: Gamification activities via smartphones to boost engagement, with individual progress monitoring and feedback mechanisms

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners can error-free calculate 20 or more basic arithmetic operation problems within one minute
Learners maintain over 90% engagement during game-based activities while improving calculation speed and accuracy
Learners can reduce arithmetic calculation error rates by 50% through weekly assessment tests

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
